Title: GridView in sharepoint style
Description:
A .NET Web Control which has featrues like the data grid in sharepoint.
Including sorting, paging, filtering and search.
HomeWiki: A custom User Control which inherits from GridView(System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView), has the gridview style like sharepoint. The developer manipulates this control like a stand .net web control; with some extend properties setting for filtering, sorting, paging and mulitSelecting.
